Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their voile moondust grey electric roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey electric roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
